name: Vegan Dhaba Chicken-free Chickn - Beyond Meat Dhaba curry
description: Free of Dairy, egg, corn, gluten, yeast. Can be made soy-free with cooked chickpeas or chopped veggies. Use mild green chili to control the heat in this recipe. Add more cayenne and black pepper later if too mild. Serves 4 as a side
recipeIngredient: 12 oz pack of any of the Beyond chicken-free strips, 2 loaded cups chopped (or use 8 oz pack Tempeh, cubed)
2 tbsp non dairy yogurt  (or thick coconut milk)

recipeInstructions.text: Chop the strips into bite size pieces (3/4 inch). Blend the yogurt, chili, lime juice until smooth. Add a tbsp water if needed. Add to chopped beyond meat or tempeh and marinade for 15 minutes or longer.
recipeInstructions.name: Chop the strips into bite size pieces (3/4 inch). Blend the yogurt, chili, lime juice until smooth. Add a tbsp water if needed. Add to chopped beyond meat or tempeh and marinade for 15 minutes or longer.

recipeInstructions.text: Make the sauce: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add onion and cook for 2 minutes. Add ginger, garlic, chili and a pinch of salt and cook until translucent. 4 to 5 minutes, Stir occasionally to avoid burning.
recipeInstructions.name: Make the sauce: Heat oil in a large skillet over medium high heat. Add onion and cook for 2 minutes. Add ginger, garlic, chili and a pinch of salt and cook until translucent. 4 to 5 minutes, Stir occasionally to avoid burning.

recipeInstructions.text: Add tomatoes and cook until they are saucy. 3 to 4 minutes.
recipeInstructions.name: Add tomatoes and cook until they are saucy. 3 to 4 minutes.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the spices, 1/2 tsp garam masala kasoori methi and salt and mix well. Add the strips, water and mix well. Reduce heat to medium-low, cover and simmer for 15 minutes. Taste and adjust salt and spice. Mix and simmer for another 5 to 10 minutes. (10 minutes for tempeh).
recipeInstructions.name: Add the spices, 1/2 tsp garam masala kasoori methi and salt and mix well. Add the strips, water and mix well. Reduce heat to medium-low, cover and simmer for 15 minutes. Taste and adjust salt and spice. Mix and simmer for another 5 to 10 minutes. (10 minutes for tempeh).

recipeInstructions.text: Garnish with garam masala and a load of cilantro. Serve hot with flatbread or rice.
recipeInstructions.name: Garnish with garam masala and a load of cilantro. Serve hot with flatbread or rice.
